random.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Random.

Author:
Andrea Vedaldi This module implements the popular Mersenne Twister algorithm (MATLAB random generator from version 7.4).

Andrea Vedaldi

Definition in file random.h.

#include "generic.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

VL_EXPORT vl_uint32 vl_rand_uint32 ()

VL_EXPORT double vl_rand_real3 ()
 Generate a random number in (0,1).
VL_EXPORT double vl_rand_res53 ()
 Generate a random number in [0,1) with 53-bit resolution.
